author: mrdon
msg: * Adding example that uses Javascript Templates (JT) to render HTML on both server and client.  On
the server, JT replaces JSP and on the client, ugly string contatenations.  Note, this example
is very unoptimized and has minor issues that I'm working on with the author of JT.
* Adding InputStream method getText() to get contents of the stream in one shot
* Adding method to JSContext to get resolved path of a resource
